title: What's up with my font?
body:
In a recent game my font started showing up like this:
[](https://ibb.co/gNdPQb)

I'm not really sure what happened. How would I fix this?

replies.body:
Hm, I can't really see any difference in font there. Let's give your config settings a quick reset to see if they got messed up somehow.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
That seems to have fixed the issues. Thank you.
